blocks.name: reff
blocks.content: For any cover refinement, there exists a function associating with each set in the refinement a set in the original cover containing it. This is sometimes used as a defintion of refinement. Note that this definition uses the axiom of choice through ~ ac6sg . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 12-Jan-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm reff(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {

  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)

  mpd(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(c0, cref, c2)), wex(s0, wa(wf(cv(s0), c0, c2), wral(s1, c0, wss(cv(s1), cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))), wral(s1, c0, wrex(hs0, c2, wss(cv(s1), cv(hs0)))))

blocks.name: locfinreflem
blocks.content: A locally finite refinement of an open cover induces a locally finite open cover with the original index set. This is fact 2 of ~ http://at.yorku.ca/p/a/c/a/02.pdf , it is expressed by exposing a function ` f ` from the original cover ` U ` , which is taken as the index set. The solution is constructed by building unions, so the same method can be used to prove a similar theorem about closed covers. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 29-Jan-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm locfinreflem(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wex(s0, wa(w3a(wfun(cv(s0)), wss(cdm(cv(s0)), c0), wss(crn(cv(s0)), c1)), wa(wbr(crn(cv(s0)), cref, c0), wcel(crn(cv(s0)), cfv(clocfin, c1))))))
  -| wceq(c2, cuni(c1))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c0, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c2, cuni(c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c3, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c3, cref, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cfv(clocfin, c1)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wex(s0, wa(w3a(wfun(cv(s0)), wss(cdm(cv(s0)), c0), wss(crn(cv(s0)), c1)), wa(wbr(crn(cv(s0)), cref, c0), wcel(crn(cv(s0)), cfv(clocfin, c1)))))), wi(w0, wss(c0, c1)))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wex(s0, wa(w3a(wfun(cv(s0)), wss(cdm(cv(s0)), c0), wss(crn(cv(s0)), c1)), wa(wbr(crn(cv(s0)), cref, c0), wcel(crn(cv(s0)), cfv(clocfin, c1)))))), diffsc(s0, c3))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wex(s0, wa(w3a(wfun(cv(s0)), wss(cdm(cv(s0)), c0), wss(crn(cv(s0)), c1)), wa(wbr(crn(cv(s0)), cref, c0), wcel(crn(cv(s0)), cfv(clocfin, c1)))))), diffsw(s0, w0))
  mpd(w0, wex(s0, wa(w3a(wfun(cv(s0)), wss(cdm(cv(s0)), c0), wss(crn(cv(s0)), c1)), wa(wbr(crn(cv(s0)), cref, c0), wcel(crn(cv(s0)), cfv(clocfin, c1))))), wex(hs0, wa(wf(cv(hs0), c3, c0), wral(hs1, c3, wss(cv(hs1), cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))))
  simprd(w0, wex(hs0, wa(wf(cv(hs0), c3, c0), wral(hs1, c3, wss(cv(hs1), cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))), wss(cuni(c0), cuni(c3)))
  mpbid(w0, wa(wss(cuni(c0), cuni(c3)), wex(hs0, wa(wf(cv(hs0), c3, c0), wral(hs1, c3, wss(cv(hs1), cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))))), wbr(c3, cref, c0))
  syl(w0, wb(wbr(c3, cref, c0), wa(wss(cuni(c0), cuni(c3)), wex(hs0, wa(wf(cv(hs0), c3, c0), wral(hs1, c3, wss(cv(hs1), cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))))), wcel(c3, cfv(clocfin, c1)))
  reff(hs0, hs1, c3, cfv(clocfin, c1), c0)
  exlimdv(hs0, w0, wa(wf(cv(hs0), c3, c0), wral(hs1, c3, wss(cv(hs1), cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))), wex(s0, wa(w3a(wfun(cv(s0)), wss(cdm(cv(s0)), c0), wss(crn(cv(s0)), c1)), wa(wbr(crn(cv(s0)), cref, c0), wcel(crn(cv(s0)), cfv(clocfin, c1))))))
  expl(w0, wf(cv(hs0), c3, c0), wral(hs1, c3, wss(cv(hs1), cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))), wex(s0, wa(w3a(wfun(cv(s0)), wss(cdm(cv(s0)), c0), wss(crn(cv(s0)), c1)), wa(wbr(crn(cv(s0)), cref, c0), wcel(crn(cv(s0)), cfv(clocfin, c1))))))
  syl32anc(wa(wa(w0, wf(cv(hs0), c3, c0)), wral(hs1, c3, wss(cv(hs1), cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))), wex(s0, wa(w3a(wfun(cv(s0)), wss(cdm(cv(s0)), c0), wss(crn(cv(s0)), c1)), wa(wbr(crn(cv(s0)), cref, c0), wcel(crn(cv(s0)), cfv(clocfin, c1))))), wfun(cmpt(hs2, crn(cv(hs0)), cuni(cima(ccnv(cv(hs0)), csn(cv(hs2)))))), wss(cdm(cmpt(hs2, crn(cv(hs0)), cuni(cima(ccnv(cv(hs0)), csn(cv(hs2)))))), c0), wss(crn(cmpt(hs2, crn(cv(hs0)), cuni(cima(ccnv(cv(hs0)), csn(cv(hs2)))))), c1), wbr(crn(cmpt(hs2, crn(cv(hs0)), cuni(cima(ccnv(cv(hs0)), csn(cv(hs2)))))), cref, c0), wcel(crn(cmpt(hs2, crn(cv(hs0)), cuni(cima(ccnv(cv(hs0)), csn(cv(hs2)))))), cfv(clocfin, c1)))
  a1i(wa(wa(w0, wf(cv(hs0), c3, c0)), wral(hs1, c3, wss(cv(hs1), cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))), wfun(cmpt(hs2, crn(cv(hs0)), cuni(cima(ccnv(cv(hs0)), csn(cv(hs2)))))))
  funmpt(hs2, crn(cv(hs0)), cuni(cima(ccnv(cv(hs0)), csn(cv(hs2)))))
  syl5ss(cdm(cmpt(hs2, crn(cv(hs0)), cuni(cima(ccnv(cv(hs0)), csn(cv(hs2)))))), c0, crn(cv(hs0)), wa(wa(w0, wf(cv(hs0), c3, c0)), wral(hs1, c3, wss(cv(hs1), cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))))
  dmmptss(hs2, cmpt(hs2, crn(cv(hs0)), cuni(cima(ccnv(cv(hs0)), csn(cv(hs2))))), crn(cv(hs0)), cuni(cima(ccnv(cv(hs0)), csn(cv(hs2)))))
  ad2antlr(w0, wf(cv(hs0), c3, c0), wral(hs1, c3, wss(cv(hs1), cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))), wss(crn(cv(hs0)), c0))

thm locfinreflem(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → ∃(s0,((Fun(s0)∧ dom(s0)⊆ c0 ∧ ran(s0)⊆ c1)∧(ran(s0)[Ref]c0 ∧ ran(s0)∈(LocFin ` c1)))))
  ⊣ c2 = ⋃ c1
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ⊆ c1)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 = ⋃ c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ⊆ c1)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3[Ref]c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈(LocFin ` c1))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  a1ii((w0 → ∃(s0,((Fun(s0)∧ dom(s0)⊆ c0 ∧ ran(s0)⊆ c1)∧(ran(s0)[Ref]c0 ∧ ran(s0)∈(LocFin ` c1))))), (w0 → c0 ⊆ c1))
  a1ii((w0 → ∃(s0,((Fun(s0)∧ dom(s0)⊆ c0 ∧ ran(s0)⊆ c1)∧(ran(s0)[Ref]c0 ∧ ran(s0)∈(LocFin ` c1))))), d(s0, c3))

blocks.name: locfinref
blocks.content: A locally finite refinement of an open cover induces a locally finite open cover with the original index set. This is fact 2 of ~ http://at.yorku.ca/p/a/c/a/02.pdf , it is expressed by exposing a function ` f ` from the original cover ` U ` , which is taken as the index set. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 31-Jan-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm locfinref(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wex(s0, w3a(wf(cv(s0), c0, c1), wbr(crn(cv(s0)), cref, c0), wcel(crn(cv(s0)), cfv(clocfin, c1)))))
  -| wceq(c2, cuni(c1))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c0, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c2, cuni(c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c3, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c3, cref, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cfv(clocfin, c1)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wex(s0, w3a(wf(cv(s0), c0, c1), wbr(crn(cv(s0)), cref, c0), wcel(crn(cv(s0)), cfv(clocfin, c1))))), diffsc(s0, c3))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wex(s0, w3a(wf(cv(s0), c0, c1), wbr(crn(cv(s0)), cref, c0), wcel(crn(cv(s0)), cfv(clocfin, c1))))), diffsw(s0, w0))
